question: Which genes predict resistance to Gefitinib or Docetaxel in Lung Non-small Cell Carcinoma?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Gefitinib')
  OR toLower(t.name) = toLower('Docetaxel')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Gefitinib'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Docetaxel'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Gefitinib')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Docetaxel')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Which genes predict resistance to Docetaxel or Pemetrexed in Non-small Cell Lung Cancer?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Docetaxel')
  OR toLower(t.name) = toLower('Pemetrexed')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Docetaxel'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Pemetrexed'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Docetaxel')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Pemetrexed')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Mitogen-Activated Protein Kinase Kinase Inhibitor')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Anti-PD-L1 Monoclonal Antibody')

AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND

  OR toLower(t.name) = toLower('Luminespib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Lorlatinib'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Luminespib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Lorlatinib')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Luminespib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Luminespib')
  OR toLower(t.name) = toLower('Osimertinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Luminespib'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Osimertinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Luminespib')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Osimertinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Which genes predict resistance to WZ4002 or Alectinib in Lung Non-small Cell Carcinoma?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('WZ4002')
  OR toLower(t.name) = toLower('Alectinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('WZ4002'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Alectinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('WZ4002')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Alectinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'

  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,

UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,

  disease_name,
  pmids

  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Alectinib')
  OR toLower(t.name) = toLower('Capmatinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Alectinib'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Capmatinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Alectinib')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Capmatinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Rociletinib')
  OR toLower(t.name) = toLower('Vandetanib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Rociletinib'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Vandetanib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Rociletinib')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Vandetanib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: What genes are resistance biomarkers for Vandetanib or Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor Tyrosine Kinase Inhibitor in Non-small Cell Lung Carcinoma?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Vandetanib')
  OR toLower(t.name) = toLower('Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor Tyrosine Kinase Inhibitor')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Vandetanib'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor Tyrosine Kinase Inhibitor'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Vandetanib')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor Tyrosine Kinase Inhibitor')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: List resistance genes for Cetuximab or Naquotinib in Non-small Cell Lung Carcinoma.
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Cetuximab')
  OR toLower(t.name) = toLower('Naquotinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Cetuximab'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Naquotinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Cetuximab')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Naquotinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Ceritinib')
  OR toLower(t.name) = toLower('Atezolizumab')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Ceritinib'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Atezolizumab'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Ceritinib')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Atezolizumab')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Ganetespib')
  OR toLower(t.name) = toLower('PD98059')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Ganetespib'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('PD98059'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Ganetespib')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('PD98059')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'colorectal'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR toLower(t.name) = toLower('Fluorouracil')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Trametinib'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Fluorouracil'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Trametinib')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Fluorouracil')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'colorectal'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: List resistance genes for FOLFOX-4 Regimen or Erlotinib in Colorectal Cancer.
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('FOLFOX-4 Regimen')
  OR toLower(t.name) = toLower('Erlotinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('FOLFOX-4 Regimen'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Erlotinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('FOLFOX-4 Regimen')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Erlotinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'colorectal'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('R3Mab'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Belinostat')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('R3Mab')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cancer'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Pralsetinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Chemotherapy')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Pralsetinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cancer'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN

  gene_symbol,

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Olaparib')
  OR toLower(t.name) = toLower('Crizotinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Olaparib'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Crizotinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Olaparib')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Crizotinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cancer'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Brigatinib'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Entrectinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Brigatinib')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Entrectinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cancer'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,

WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL

WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Selumetinib')
  OR toLower(t.name) = toLower('Imatinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Selumetinib'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Imatinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Selumetinib')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Imatinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cancer'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Bafetinib')
  OR toLower(t.name) = toLower('Imatinib Mesylate')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Bafetinib'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Imatinib Mesylate'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Bafetinib')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Imatinib Mesylate')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cancer'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Capecitabine')
  OR toLower(t.name) = toLower('Dasatinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Capecitabine'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Dasatinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Capecitabine')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Dasatinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cancer'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: What genes are resistance biomarkers for Dasatinib or Lapatinib in Malignant Tumor?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Dasatinib')
  OR toLower(t.name) = toLower('Lapatinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Dasatinib'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Lapatinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Dasatinib')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Lapatinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cancer'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,

WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL

RETURN

  disease_name,

LIMIT 100

question: Which genes predict resistance to Larotrectinib or Paclitaxel in Primary Cancer?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Larotrectinib')
  OR toLower(t.name) = toLower('Paclitaxel')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Larotrectinib'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Paclitaxel'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Larotrectinib')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Paclitaxel')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cancer'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Tegafur')
  OR toLower(t.name) = toLower('Trastuzumab')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Tegafur'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Trastuzumab'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Tegafur')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Trastuzumab')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cancer'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: List resistance genes for Rebemadlin or Sunitinib in Cancer.
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Rebemadlin')
  OR toLower(t.name) = toLower('Sunitinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Rebemadlin'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Sunitinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Rebemadlin')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Sunitinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cancer'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR toLower(t.name) = toLower('HER2 Inhibitor CP-724,714')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Sunitinib'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('HER2 Inhibitor CP-724,714'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Sunitinib')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('HER2 Inhibitor CP-724,714')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cancer'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN

  gene_symbol,

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Nilotinib')
  OR toLower(t.name) = toLower('Multi-subtype Natural Human Leukocyte Interferon Alpha')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Nilotinib'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Multi-subtype Natural Human Leukocyte Interferon Alpha'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Nilotinib')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Multi-subtype Natural Human Leukocyte Interferon Alpha')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'melanoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Immune Checkpoint Inhibitor'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Mirdametinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Immune Checkpoint Inhibitor')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Mirdametinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'melanoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)

  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Selumetinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Sorafenib')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Selumetinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'melanoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN

question: In Naevocarcinoma, which genes confer resistance to Imatinib or Ipilimumab?
cypher:

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Ipilimumab'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Imatinib')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Ipilimumab')

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Vemurafenib')
  OR toLower(t.name) = toLower('Dabrafenib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Vemurafenib'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Dabrafenib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Vemurafenib')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Dabrafenib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'melanoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Dabrafenib')
  OR toLower(t.name) = toLower('Refametinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Dabrafenib'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Refametinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Dabrafenib')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Refametinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'melanoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Larotrectinib'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Dasatinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Larotrectinib')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Dasatinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'solid' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'tumor'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Tamoxifen')
  OR toLower(t.name) = toLower('Neratinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Tamoxifen'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Neratinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Tamoxifen')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Neratinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'breast'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Hormone Therapy')
  OR toLower(t.name) = toLower('Vorinostat')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Hormone Therapy'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Vorinostat'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Hormone Therapy')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Vorinostat')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'breast'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Afatinib')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Infigratinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'breast'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR toLower(t.name) = toLower('FEC Regimen')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Lapatinib'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('FEC Regimen'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Lapatinib')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('FEC Regimen')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'breast'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('FEC Regimen')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Afimoxifene')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'breast'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN

  gene_symbol,

  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('MTOR Kinase Inhibitor AZD8055')

  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Pictilisib')
  OR toLower(t.name) = toLower('PI-103')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Pictilisib'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('PI-103'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Pictilisib')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('PI-103')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'breast'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: List resistance genes for Aromatase Inhibitor or Pan-AKT Kinase Inhibitor GSK690693 in Mammary Tumor.
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Aromatase Inhibitor')
  OR toLower(t.name) = toLower('Pan-AKT Kinase Inhibitor GSK690693')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Aromatase Inhibitor'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Pan-AKT Kinase Inhibitor GSK690693'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Aromatase Inhibitor')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Pan-AKT Kinase Inhibitor GSK690693')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'breast'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Monomethyl Auristatin E'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Ribociclib')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Monomethyl Auristatin E')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'breast'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)

  OR toLower(t.name) = toLower('Letrozole')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Trastuzumab'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Letrozole'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Trastuzumab')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Letrozole')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'breast'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,

RETURN

  OR toLower(t.name) = toLower('Amrubicin')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Selumetinib'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Amrubicin'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Selumetinib')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Amrubicin')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('ALK Inhibitor TAE684'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Crizotinib')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('ALK Inhibitor TAE684')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'

    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'neuroblastoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Regorafenib Anhydrous'))

  OR toLower(t.name) = toLower('Dasatinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Bafetinib'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Dasatinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Bafetinib')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Dasatinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'chronic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'myeloid' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: List resistance genes for FLT3/ABL/Aurora Kinase Inhibitor KW-2449 or Ponatinib in Acute Myelogenous Leukemia.
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('FLT3/ABL/Aurora Kinase Inhibitor KW-2449')
  OR toLower(t.name) = toLower('Ponatinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('FLT3/ABL/Aurora Kinase Inhibitor KW-2449'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Ponatinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('FLT3/ABL/Aurora Kinase Inhibitor KW-2449')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Ponatinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'acute' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'myeloid' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Ponatinib')
  OR toLower(t.name) = toLower('Daunorubicin')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Ponatinib'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Daunorubicin'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Ponatinib')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Daunorubicin')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'acute' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'myeloid' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100
